game.name: RESEED
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: What if you were playing a platformer, but couldn’t see the traps? In RESEED, your mission is to rescue the last living seeds from a corrupted planet, relying only on memory and skill to survive each invisible challenge.
game.shortDescriptionEn: What if you were playing a platformer, but couldn’t see the traps? In RESEED, your mission is to rescue the last living seeds from a corrupted planet, relying only on memory and skill to survive each invisible challenge.
